name: six
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the number 6: Look for a bus with a number six on the front. "How many grandchildren do you have now?" "I've got six."
More examplesFewer examplesRosie's six years old now.He cut the cake into six pieces.He laid six places at the table.She had six children.There'll be six of us at the meeting.

Idioms
at sixes and sevens
be six feet under
six of one and half a dozen of the other
six of the best
in cricket, six runs (= points) scored when the player hits the ball to the edge of the playing area without it touching the ground first: Richards hit a six.

6: My sister is six. a six-sided figure
Six can also mean six o’clock.
